data.text: Salomɔn ná-tɛnɛ faalaaliiti.
Naavoloi sɔlɔɔ pelei ɲɔuɗai, é la faa ʋaa eyɛsu pɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la telebo nui yɛga na, é ʋa ɓɔlɔ ga pului,
Zɔi é la yeeʋɛa faa ʋa, naa ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga bala nu,
Nii é ani ɠaalɛɛzu ba, foɠo undaaɠulazuʋɛ, naa ɠa ga doun zunui, nii keleɠelegai,
Tuyaiti ta ʋuuni telebo nui unmaʋɛ,
Telebo nui ná-kizɛsui ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga tuyai taɠiligaani bɛ,
Zɔi ɠigi ma ziimaʋɛ, naa ɠa ɗa deveiti so,
Zɔi é ziɛzu sɔledai zu, naa ɠa ziɛzu ziilɛigi zu,
Nii é gaamai lɔɔɠuzu bɔɔlaiti ba, naa ɠa ti ɓɔlɔzu,
Telebo nui laawooiti ta ga zɛnvu ɗɛungi,
Wɔinzeɠemai ɠa ɗa sakpegi ɠaazo,
Keleɠele nui laawooi ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga ɠima ɓɔɛi,
Ɠima nuiti ta ɗa faaɠwɛgi ɠaalɛ ba,
Kpɛtɛ nui yeaɠɔligi ɠa bɛ ga taa wolai siɠigi ma,
Telebo nui ná-tɔnɔgi ɠa ɗa lo tuɠɔ, é zɛnvui wo,
Zɔi é woilosu tɛnɛ gooi ma, naa zɛnvu ʋelei zeɠea,
Wooveledai ɠana, ɗa wɔinzeɠemai lɔɔɠuna,
Zɔi é kpɔɛi zuɠulazu gola, é la ɓega tɔ koloɠologi ɠɛɛzu,
Telebo nui laawooiti ta ga walii ɲadegai,
Telebo nui laawooiti ta ɗa ɓɔ nuɓusɛ mɔinmɔin ba,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laa luyai ɠa a ɗa kulagaanɛɛzui ve,
Faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛ vai ɠa ga ɠaɠo faa ɠimalala nui ya,
Nii nu ɲɔi luazu ba, naa ɠa a ɗa sɔlɔɔ,
Siɛgi zu tɔngɔlɔ fiilɛi leʋesu da, nu ɲɔi ɠa ɗa ɲɛɛlɛ!
Eɠɛʋelei ani ɓodai a ɗa kɛ la ga nu ɲiigai,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa ɗa nui ná-eteai zuɠooza,
Telebo nui ná-maaɓɔungi ʋolu ɠa ɠɛ ga koozunɛɛi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-pelei ɠa ga siɠigi wooɠɛɠila nuiti maaɠoolii zu,
Telebo nui la ɲiikpiga eyɛsu pɛ,
Telebo nui laaʋɛ ɠa ɗa ɠimalai wo,
Telebo nui lakɔlɔgiti ti nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠwɛɛ,
